input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product specification:
ValuePack (2 Count): Digital Replacement Camera and Camcorder Battery for Canon BP-718, BP-709, BP-727 - Includes Lens Pouch

Product keywords:
Includes TWO Compatible Rechargeable Lithium Ion Digital Batteries With No Memory Effect and ONE Leatherette Camera/Lens Accessories Pouch 15 X 24 Centimeters.
18 Months Manufacturer Warranty, Engineered and Manufactured Under European Standard ISO 9001. Guaranteed Superior Quality Meets or Exceeds High Priced OEM Products.
1600 mAh, 3.7 Volts, CE Approved, ROHS Compliant.
Protective Retail Packaging, Each Product is wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging.
Exclusive Offering of High Performance, Long Lasting, and Durable Grade A Cell Battery
Meets and exceeds high-priced OEM products, allowing you to power your camera/camcorder with a superior-quality battery for a fraction of the price
Compatibilities: Camera models: LEGRIA HF M506, LEGRIA HF M52, LEGRIA HF M56, LEGRIA HF R306, LEGRIA HF R36, LEGRIA HF R37, LEGRIA HF R38, VIXIA HF M50, VIXIA HF M500, VIXIA HF M52, VIXIA HF R30, VIXIA HF R300, VIXIA HF R32, VIXIA HF R40, VIXIA HF R400, VIXIA HF R42. 
Battery models: BP-709, BP709, BP-727 BP727

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This is an exclusive offering of High Performance, Long Lasting, and Durable Grade A Cell Battery. It is compatible with the following Camera models: LEGRIA HF M506, LEGRIA HF M52, LEGRIA HF M56, LEGRIA HF R306, LEGRIA HF R36, LEGRIA HF R37, LEGRIA HF R38, VIXIA HF M50, VIXIA HF M500, VIXIA HF M52, VIXIA HF R30, VIXIA HF R300, VIXIA HF R32, VIXIA HF R40, VIXIA HF R400, VIXIA HF R42. It includes protective retail packaging and each product is wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging. The battery models are BP-709, BP-727, and BP-727. This battery is engineered and manufactured under European Standard ISO 9001. It is guaranteed to meet or even exceed high-priced OEM products while allowing you to power your camera/camcorder with a superior-quality battery for a fraction of the price. It is 1600 mAh, 3.7 Volts, CE Approved, and ROHS Compliant.
input_text.Response B:
Looking for a new battery for your Canon camera or camcorder?  Look no further than the ValuePack (2 Count): Digital Replacement Camera and Camcorder Battery for Canon BP-718, BP-709, BP-727! 
This battery is a direct replacement for the Canon BP-718, BP-709, and BP-727 batteries and is guaranteed to meet or exceed the high-priced OEM products. 
The ValuePack includes TWO Compatible Rechargeable Lithium Ion Digital Batteries With No Memory Effect and ONE Leatherette Camera/Lens Accessories Pouch 15 X 24 Centimeters. 
Each product is wrapped with an inner plastic bag and outer box packaging. 
The battery is CE Approved and ROHS Compliant, and is engineered and manufactured under European Standard ISO 9001. 
With a 1600 mAh, 3.7 Volts, and 18 Months Manufacturer Warranty, you can be sure that you are getting a quality product.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
